data.text: Container
a widget that holds other widgets
Text
a widget that shows a text or html text.
Image
a widget that shows an image from network, file, asset.
Column
a widget that renders child widgets in vertical direction
Row
a widget that renders child widgets in horizontal direction
Button
a widget that helps to do action
TextField
a widget that takes input from user
Card
a widget that creates a visually appealing container
ListView
a widget that shows widgets in a list
Stack
a widget that renders child widgets in stack manner
TabView
a widget that renders screens in tabs
Loader
a widget that shows circular loading bar

data.newText: Hello, I have updated the title.

data.text: Update Static/Dynamic UI
Click this card you will know.
Refresh Dynamic UI
It will reload network page based on events triggered
